cards.title: Fast
cards.text: In a rush? Do not worry, just log in, create a new Nok, and your Nokia colleagues will help you as soon as possible!

cards.title: Reliable
cards.text: Not sure if the answer you got is correct? Worry not! Every answer on Nokia Overflow has a dedicated rating that shows you how many other people agree with that answer.

cards.title: Made for everyone
cards.text: Are you a software engineer? Or maybe a network administrator? It does not matter. Nokia Overflow offers dedicated labels for every job you fit in!
